name: Killbook 6900
description:
Merely a "playable" build, will definitely be sprucing this up for a more FLESHED out experience. Lemme know what you think so far!

  1. Find target PC
  2. Put Killbook 6900™ on the table to start stealing that data baby
  3. Put your right hand near the Killbook 6900™ and pull the trigger to activate Killmode™. Use touchpad to aim and trigger to fire. But don't spam or turret will overheat. (WARNING: Killmode™ PAUSES DOWNLOAD WHILE IN USE.)
    1. Press grip button to put turret away and continue stealing data
  4. When you've collected all the data, head to the roof and activate Coptermode™ for a clean getaway. 

Soundtrack by Sonny Wong.

Made in 2 days because I was still finish the last game jam's deadline I missed :(

#VRJAM2020
